assignments.description: Update the Renewal Opp field on the record var with the ID of the Renewal Opp the system found that already links to this Contract.

assignments.label: Link to Existing Renewal Opp (Found Record)

assignments.description: Link the Opp that was selected by the User to the Contract Record Var for later update.
assignments.name: Link_to_Existing_Renewal_Opp_User_Selection
assignments.label: Link to Existing Renewal Opp (User Selection)

decisions.description: Were any Open Renewal Opps found for the Account? If so then give the user the option to link to one of these instead of creating.
decisions.name: Account_Renewals_Found
decisions.label: Account Renewals Found?

decisions.description: Check there is already an Open Rebid/Extension that links to this Contract.
decisions.name: Check_No_Existing_Renewal_Decision
decisions.label: Check No Existing Renewal

decisions.description: Do Open Contract Line Items exist (not Terminated)?
decisions.name: OpenCLI_exist
decisions.label: Pending/Active CLIs Exist?

decisions.description: Contract Opportunity & Original Opp are blank then Get Price Book related to Contract Owner
decisions.name: Opp_Lookups_are_Blank
decisions.label: Opp Lookups are Blank?

decisions.description: Did the User select an Opportunity to link the Contract to?
decisions.name: Opp_Selected_Decision
decisions.label: Opportunity Selected?

formulas.description: Current End Date Plus 365 days for Rebid Opp End Date

recordLookups.description: Get any Rebid/Extension Opportunity for this Account that's open.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account_Open_Renewals
recordLookups.label: Get Account Open Renewals

recordLookups.description: Get Open Renewal Opportunities that relate to this Contract (only the first). If there are open Renewal Opps then do not allow another Opp to be created.
recordLookups.name: Get_Open_Renewal_Contract
recordLookups.label: Get Open Renewal (Contract)

recordLookups.description: Get Price Book Entries from Price Book & Currency of Contract
recordLookups.name: Get_Price_Book_Entries

recordUpdates.name: Link_Contract_to_Existing_Renewal_Opp
recordUpdates.label: Link Contract to Existing Renewal Opp

fields.name: ErrorScreen_DT1
fields.fieldText:
We encountered an error while creating the Rebid Opportunity.


Please review the Error below and if it relates to something you can resolve yourself, such as an incorrect date, then update this yourself and try again. Otherwise please create an Incident on ServiceNow making sure to include a link to the Contract and providing details (ServiceNow -> Report a Problem -> Business Applications -> Salesforce -> OCS Contracts).


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Auto_Linked_DT
fields.fieldText: There is already an Open {!Get_Open_Renewal_Contract.Type} {!Open_Renewals_Table.firstSelectedRow.Type} Opportunity that relates to this Contract.

fields.name: EixstingRebidFoundScreen_DT1
fields.fieldText: The Contract has been successfully linked to the {!Get_Open_Renewal_Contract.Name} {!Open_Renewals_Table.firstSelectedRow.Name} {!Get_Open_Renewal_Contract.Type} {!Open_Renewals_Table.firstSelectedRow.Type} Opportunity.

fields.name: NoCLIScreen_DT1
fields.fieldText: This Contract does not have any Line Items, all Line Items have been terminated or all Line Items have zero value and so it is not possible to create a Rebid Opportunity.

fields.name: Existing_Renewal_Opps_Found_DT
fields.fieldText:
Existing Renewal Opportunities Found


Existing Renewal Opportunities were found for this Account. Do you want to link the Contract to one of these Opportunities?

value.stringValue: Link Contract to Existing Renewal Opportunity?

fields.name: Renewal_Opportunity_Not_Listed_DT
fields.fieldText: If the appropriate Renewal Opportunity is not listed below then please change the slider to 'No', click Continue and you will be taken to setup a new Renewal Opportunity.

fields.name: Link_to_Renewal_Opp_Screen_DT
fields.fieldText: When you click Continue this Contract will be related to the selected Renewal Opportunity - {!Open_Renewals_Table.firstSelectedRow.Name}

fields.name: Continue_to_Opp_Creation_DT
fields.fieldText:
Since none of the listed Opportunities relate to this Contract you will be taken to create a Renewal Opportunity once you click Continue.

To link this Contract to an existing Renewal Opportunity please change the slider to 'Yes'.

fields.name: UserInput_DT1
fields.fieldText:
Please choose an Award Date and a Contract End Date for the new {!Type_Selection_QuickChoice.value} Opportunity.


Current Contract End Date: {!recordId.Contract_End_Date__c}

Renewal Contract Start Date: {!ContractEndDatePlus1}

validationRule.errorMessage: Award Date must be a future date (or today)
Contract End Date must be after Contract Start Date ({!ContractEndDatePlus1})

fields.name: UserInput_DT2
fields.fieldText: The Award Date must be in the future.

value.stringValue: Contract: Create Renewal Opportunity Screen Flow

variables.description: Record input variable for the Contract__c record where the button was clicked.
variables.name: recordId
